short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that shows the latest news and articles on the new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with our new browser extension! Transform your new tab into a hub of the latest news and articles from trusted Uzbek sources, including kun.uz, daryo.uz, qalampir.uz, gazeta.uz, and demokrat.uz. Stay updated with:

Real-time updates: Get the latest news as it happens.

Curated content: Enjoy articles covering a wide range of topics, from politics to lifestyle.

Clean design: Experience a distraction-free, user-friendly interface.

Perfect for staying informed while navigating your day-to-day tasks. Install the extension today and make every tab count!
